Hello hello ðŸ‘‹

A brainstorming workshop is one of the most common types of workshops out there because of its simplicity.

The folks from AJ&Smart created this simple 10-minutes exercise called "10 for 10" focusing on getting great ideas on the table without pointless discussion, frustration, and yelling.


I created this "10 for 10 Brainstorming Workshop" template for all workshop facilitators and Design Thinkers practitioners out there who want to take advantage of this activity to end up with a curated list of solutions and ideas for a specific challenge.


If you have any questions/feedback/praise, please leave a comment below or reach out via Twitter: @juarezpaf


----

This template is based on The ultimate 10-minute brainstorming activity from the Workshopper Playbook.
